original_title: Vishuddha Arappiyude Onnam Athbhutha Pravarthi വിശുദ്ധ അരപ്പിയുടെ ഒന്നാം അത്ഭുത പ്രവൃത്തി
overview: A string of adventures following when the village half-wit Arappi agrees to dispose the dead-body of Kunjappan, finally resulting in something miraculous for his soul.
title: The First Miraculous Act of Arappi
